This method calls superclass canBuild method, if it returns false, the MultipleMovementDelegate canMove method is called, to determine if the Player has lost or if it can still perform another move.

If the Player is trying to perform a Build BEFORE the Move phase, Prometheus power is activated.

checkBuildConstraints(Worker, Cell, BlockType) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.GodStrategy
This is the method used to check if there are build constraints imposed by other Players that don't permit the Worker to execute a particular building action.
checkCanBuildOtherGodsConstraints(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
This method checks if one of the parameter-player's workers can build or not, related to other players' God Powers; in particular, some God's Powers can totally inhibit a player's possibility to build with one of his/her workers.
checkCanMoveOtherGodsConstraints(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
This method checks if one of the parameter-player's workers can move or not, related to other players' God Powers; in particular, some God's Powers can totally inhibit a player's possibility to move with one of his/her workers.
checkEndTurn() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.GodStrategy
This method is called once a turn, to check if end turn constraints are satisfied.
checkEndTurn() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Prometheus
This method is called to check that, if Prometheus built before move, also a build action after the move has been performed.
checkEndTurnConstraints(Player) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.GodStrategy
This method is called once a turn, to check if end turn constraints from other Player's Gods (if present) are satisfied.
checkGamePreparation(Worker, Cell, Worker, Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Eros
This method checks that Eros Game Preparation constraints are satisfied: the workers must be at opposite sides of the Match board.
checkGamePreparation(Worker, Cell, Worker, Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.GodStrategy
This method is called once a match (for every player), to check if game preparation constraints (if present) are satisfied.

This method is called once a match (for every player), to check if game preparation constraints from other Player's Gods (if present) are satisfied.

checkMove(Worker, Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Apollo
Implements standard controls on worker movement, except the check about emptiness of the new position (Apollo player's worker can be swapped with an adjacent worker).
checkMove(Worker, Cell) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Artemis
